Summary: Results-driven and deadline-focused sales engineer with six years of experience in technical sales. Proven track record of delivering growth results, managing territories up to $350M, and driving significant savings for clients.

Functions.Description: Recognized and addressed customer needs for filtration and lubrication products and services.
Responsibilities: Designed and implemented a highly effective industrial filtration program, resulting in significant savings for customers and increased company profits.
Initiated Lubrication Fundamentals classes to educate employees and customers on product information, machine elements, application methods, storing lubricant, and conservation.
Acted as a consultant on Best-in-Class Lubrication programs.

Functions.Description: Managed day-to-day program management, customer relationships, and estimation of medical programs for critical Fortune 500 clients.
Responsibilities: Designed and presented tailored technical solutions to top-32 state automotive dealers, driving sales from $3M to $18M over five years.
Supervised logistics and proof of concept pilots worth up to $800,000.
Exceeded yearly quota by 145% and provided 97.5% satisfaction support to managed territory.
